description:
The heartthrob Su Nanzhi, after being summoned by the NPC system, foresees that he will be killed by the “people” who can’t love him.

To change the future and return to the world, Su Nanzhi disguised as a player and entered the dungeon.

The system said: “After the horror atmosphere reaches 100, the host will be exempted from injury.”

Sunanzhi: Come on, be a worker!​​

After working for n days…why does the whole world love him like crazy!!

Su Nanzhi – QWQ: I’m just a terrible ghost!>
